title: gmp build error due to libtoolize / glibtoolize
body:
Summary

I'm trying to build gcc on a mac (darwin) and it fails by looking for libtoolize, while only glibtoolize exists.  This appears to be related to the recent commits on the lilbtool build.  This error occurs with the version of spack pulled from github today.


### Actual Result
[tagardi@s1002808: spack]$ spack install gcc languages=c,c++,fortran,objc

[tagardi@s1002808: spack]$ ls /Users/tagardi/opt/spack/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/clang-8.0.0-apple/libtool-2.4.6-lcjvxlym37f7hwok3hlmzeby6kim7x2f/bin/
glibtool    glibtoolize


### Steps to reproduce the issue

On a darwin system:

```console
$ spack install gcc
```

### Information on your system

This problem occurs on OS X El Capitan, version 10.11.6 with a clean checkout of spack.
